thread.title: Circumstances of fatal officer-involved shooting not clear
thread.title_full: Circumstances of fatal officer-involved shooting not clear - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Circumstances of fatal officer-involved shooting not clear
text:
COLUMBUS, Miss. (AP) - Mississippi authorities say police in Columbus have shot and killed a 33-year-old man, and the case has been turned over to the Mississippi Bureau of Investigation.
WCBI-TV ( http://bit.ly/1NiVXH0 ) reports that Rickey Javenta Ball, of Columbus, was shot during a traffic stop.
Police have not said what touched off the shooting Friday night.
WTVA-TV reports ( http://bit.ly/1QIs3gd ) that Ball was hit in an arm and his buttocks, and a bullet apparently hit an artery.
Lowndes County Coroner Greg Merchant released his identity Saturday.
The Mississippi Bureau of Investigation investigates police shootings. Spokesman Warren Strain did not immediately respond to a call for comment Sunday.
According to WTVA, Ball had been given a ride by a woman who said she did not know him.
Copyright redistributed.
